body: Hi Anton, 1. I believe your test surface and context were very far from each other. 2. Context was not supplied to SunlightHours component 3. Grid size was too big. Except that everything is good. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/iHTeMy8PBD003d8-fsHxPHM4ZqqbOznIvo7iBgSiDb6cyfEfMDlv2d7-tI*xGCBRGj9knFIsNUxJw2OFk515-lsbW80speiD/Capture.JPG) -Devang
